effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x. If this move misses or the user leaves the field, power resets.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x. If this move misses or the user leaves the field, power resets.

effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x. If this move misses or the user leaves the field, power resets.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that grows stronger on each successive hit.
